attributes.action: Altaf Hussain, a british national of Pakistan origin, is inciting act of terrorism in Karachi
attributes.additional_details:
Altaf Hussain is a British national of Pakistan origin. He heads a political party in Pakistan namely Muthaida Quomi Movement (MQM) from UK. He is an abscounder and convicted person, responsible for murder, extortion & other henious crimes against humanity in Pakistan.

In his recent telephonic address on 12th May 13 to his party workers in Pakistan, he threatened to kill peaceful protesters in Karachi. He has been invloved in act of terrorism, glorifying terrorism and severe violation of fundamental freedom of speech.

This person has obtained British Nationality on false claims and Home Office should investigate his credentials to be a British Citizen.

Pakistanis across the globe demand that Altaf Hussain's British Nationality should be revoked and he should be tried for crimes against humanity and act of terrorism in the UK.
